attributes.action: WE WANT a LABOUR GOVERMENT NOW!!!! TO DELIVER BREXIT
attributes.additional_details: vote today we need a labour now jermeny knows whats right for our country forget boris he wants a trump deal to destroy our nhs. we want to leave the eu with a deal that protect our jobs and the whole country. we want our country to be together.
attributes.background: we need a labour goverment today. jermeny corbyn is the right man to deliver brexit. boris johnson and his goverment are destroying our country by leaving the eu with out a deal. (no deal)

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions that contain party political material.
